SELECT M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL /* SAP플랜트값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP자재코드 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_NM /* SAP자재명 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_TP_VAL /* SAP자재유형값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_GRP_VAL /* SAP자재그룹값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_BAS_UNIT_VAL /* SAP자재기본단위값 */ , M1.SAP_PDCT_SCLSRT_STRC_VAL /* SAP제품계층구조값 */ , M1.MODEL_NO /* 모델번호 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL /* SAP자재평가클래스값 */ FROM TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ M1 /* SAP자재수신내역 */ WHERE M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 데이터삭제여부 */ AND M1.USE_YN != 'X' AND ( M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2015' AND '2016' OR M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2107' AND '2109' )
AND UPPER(M1.SAP_MAT_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dto.searchKeyword}) || '%' /* SAP자재코드 */
AND UPPER(M1.SAP_MAT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dto.searchKeyword}) || '%' /* SAP자재명 */
